name: CARNIVAL CANS!
description:
PLEASE LAUNCH THE GAME IN FULLSCREEN MODE TO PREVENT SCALING ISSUES. 

This is my Cross platform game development assignment 2. The game is called CARNIVAL CANS! and the aim is to shoot down the cans and obtain the highest amount of score possible. The game is made with unity and uses JSON methods to save the high score. CARNIVAL CANS! is a low poly based game made in Unity. The music and audio in game are taken from free sources and are not created by me. 

TO PLAY: shoot the cans with left click on your mouse, mouse movement controls where you aim. Once you're our of ammo, wait the grace period for the out of ammo screen to appear and feel free to click play again or exit to the menu.
